text: Paradrymonia is a genus of plant in family Gesneriaceae. It contains the following species (among 40+ species): * Paradrymonia aurea Wiehler * Paradrymonia binata Wiehler * Paradrymonia fuquaiana Wiehler * Paradrymonia hypocyrta Wiehler * Paradrymonia lacera Wiehler * Paradrymonia lineata (C.V.Morton) Wiehler Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Gesneriaceae genera
title: Paradrymonia
